nodes.description: 3月7日伊拉克举行选举但无明确结果，导致政治真空
nodes.support_text: the March 7 election which produced no outright winner

nodes.description: 6月13日极端分子袭击中央银行，18人死亡
nodes.support_text: gunmen and suicide bombers laid siege to the central bank in Baghdad, killing 18 people

nodes.description: 6月20日两辆装满炸药的汽车在Trade Bank外爆炸，致26人死亡
nodes.support_text: Two suicide bombers detonated cars laden with explosives outside the Trade Bank of Iraq

nodes.description: 政治合并预期挤压投票领先的跨党派联盟，可能引发暴力
nodes.support_text: a merger of the main Shi’ite-led coalitions in the new parliament is expected to squeeze out the vote leader

nodes.description: 美国计划8月结束作战行动，但政治不确定性可能影响撤军

nodes.description: 极端分子试图利用选举后的政治真空，加剧sectarian冲突
nodes.support_text: exploit a political vacuum that followed the March 7 election

nodes.description: 基地组织相关极端分子被指为袭击幕后黑手
nodes.support_text: Security officials blamed the June 13 central bank attack on Sunni Islamist insurgents linked to al Qaeda

nodes.description: 最新袭击引发对国家稳定的担忧
